name: CVE-2020-10029
description: The GNU C Library (aka glibc or libc6) before 2.32 could overflow an on-stack buffer during range reduction if an input to an 80-bit long double function contains a non-canonical bit pattern, a seen when passing a 0x5d414141414141410000 value to sinl on x86 targets. This is related to sysdeps/ieee754/ldbl-96/e_rem_pio2l.c.
pattern: [(software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:gnu:glibc:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:fedoraproject:fedora:30:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:fedoraproject:fedora:31:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:fedoraproject:fedora:32:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:canonical:ubuntu_linux:18.04:*:*:*:lts:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:canonical:ubuntu_linux:19.10:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:canonical:ubuntu_linux:16.04:*:*:*:esm:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:opensuse:leap:15.1:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:netapp:cloud_backup:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:netapp:steelstore_cloud_integrated_storage:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:netapp:solidfire:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:netapp:hci_management_node:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:netapp:active_iq_unified_manager:-:*:*:*:*:vmware_vsphere:*:*') OR ((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:netapp:h410c_firmware:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:h:netapp:h410c:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')) OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:debian:debian_linux:10.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')]

external_references.description: This object was created using cve2stix from the Signals Corps.
